attributes.action: have mandatory option to see balance on Chip and Pin devices to reduce overspending
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It's easy to spend too much and leave yourself short on a debit card and rack up more spend than you would have liked on a credit card. This is due to users often not being exactly sure of their current balance on a use by use basis. People should have the option every time they use a card to see their remaining balance after the transaction has taken place on a chip and pin device in order to better manage their finances. This could work with a simple "Please remove your card or press 1 to see your balance" message that would clear as soon as the card is removed. Reducing overspend reduces debt.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
